original_text: And they answered, We will willingly give them. And they spread a garment, and did cast therein every man the earrings of his prey.
korean_text: 무리가 대답하되 우리가 즐거이 드리리이다 하고 겉옷을 펴고 각기 탈취한 귀고리를 그 가운데에 던지니

sentences.original_text: and did cast therein every man the earrings of his prey
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람이 자기가 얻은 전리품의 귀걸이를 그 안에 던졌습니다
